title: What Could Possibly Go Wrong?
description: Max is back! New husband, new job, and a training regime that cannot fail – to go wrong! Take one interim Chief Training Officer, add five recruits, mix with Joan of Arc, a baby mammoth, a duplicitous Father of History, a bombed rat, Stone Age hunters, a couple of passing policemen who should have better things to do, and Dick the Turd. Stir well, bring to the boil – and wait for the bang!Join Max in the sixth instalment in the off-the-wall Chronicles of St Mary’s series.
author: Jodi Taylor
